verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> Maschil, <WH4905> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah. <WH7141> As the hart <WH354> pants <WH6165> after <WH5921> the water <WH4325> brooks, <WH650> so <WH3651> pants <WH6165> my soul <WH5315> after <WH413> you, O God. <WH430>
My soul <WH5315> thirsts <WH6770> for God, <WH430> for the living <WH2416> God: <WH410> when <WH4970> shall I come <WH935> and appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> God? <WH430>
My tears <WH1832> have been <WH1961> my meat <WH3899> day <WH3119> and night, <WH3915> while they continually <WH3605> <WH3117> say <WH559> to me, Where <WH346> is your God? <WH430>

When I remember <WH2142> these <WH428> things, I pour <WH8210> out my soul <WH5315> in me: for I had gone <WH5674> with the multitude, <WH5519> I went <WH1718> with them to the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430> with the voice <WH6963> of joy <WH7440> and praise, <WH8426> with a multitude <WH1995> that kept <WH2287> holy day. <WH2287>

Why <WH4100> are you cast <WH7817> down, <WH7817> O my soul? <WH5315> and why are you disquieted <WH1993> in me? hope <WH3176> you in God: <WH430> for I shall yet <WH5750> praise <WH3034> him for the help <WH3444> of his countenance. <WH6440>

O my God, <WH430> my soul <WH5315> is cast <WH7817> down <WH7817> within <WH5921> me: therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> will I remember <WH2142> you from the land <WH776> of Jordan, <WH3383> and of the Hermonites, <WH2769> from the hill <WH2022> Mizar. <WH4706>
Deep <WH8415> calls <WH7121> to deep <WH8415> at the noise <WH6963> of your waterspouts: <WH6794> all <WH3605> your waves <WH4867> and your billows <WH1530> are gone <WH5674> over <WH5921> me.

Yet the LORD <WH3068> will command <WH6680> his loving kindness <WH2617> in the day time, <WH3119> and in the night <WH3915> his song <WH7892> shall be with me, and my prayer <WH8605> to the God <WH410> of my life. <WH2416>
I will say <WH559> to God <WH410> my rock, <WH5553> Why <WH4100> have you forgotten <WH7911> me? why <WH4100> go <WH3212> I mourning <WH6937> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy? <WH341>
As with a sword <WH7524> in my bones, <WH6106> my enemies <WH6887> reproach <WH2778> me; while they say <WH559> daily <WH3605> <WH3117> to me, Where <WH346> is your God? <WH430>

Why <WH4100> are you cast <WH7817> down, <WH7817> O my soul? <WH5315> and why <WH4100> are you disquieted <WH1993> within <WH5921> me? hope <WH3176> you in God: <WH430> for I shall yet <WH5750> praise <WH3034> him, who is the health <WH3444> of my countenance, <WH6440> and my God. <WH430>
